```{r}
#multiple summaries
a<-heights %>%
  filter(sex == "Female") %>%
  summarise(median_min_max = quantile(height, c(0.5, 0, 1)))

median_min_max <- function(x) {
  qs <- quantile(x, c(0.5,0,1))
  data.frame(median = qs [1], minimum = qs[2], maximum =qs[3])
}
```
